title: The Marriage Lease
description: The Marriage Lease is a novelette that chronicles the journey of Nick, a young lawyer who is troubled by the mandatory lifetime obligations the traditional marriage contract is forcing upon him. In an effort to save the world s most sacred institution, he proposes a radical change. Along with his gregarious Uncle Julian, he creates a draft of the world's first marriage lease . This shocking new take on marriage will rock his small town and reverberate throughout the world in ways he never thought possible.
author: Burke Mudge
